Posted By: Travis Wise

i would prefer for it to be graded either auth or a 1!  

Just missed some recently...

Travis

Posted By: barrysloate
Travis- I have a Browns Champ Kemler graded SGC 10 that will go up on ebay tomorrow night. Good luck if you go after it.  regards, Barry

Posted By: Travis Wise
Great thanks Barry i just got the Purcell and Brown today!!! They are amazing!!!!!!

Posted By: barrysloate
Yes- great photo quality on them. That counts more than anything else.

Posted By: Anonymous
it is almost unreal how bright they look compared to other old judges that you see...if i didnt know better they would seem fake....

Posted By: barrysloate
You can find OJ's with really good photos, and they are worth a premium. I've long maintained that the graders should give cards like that at least a one-grade bump, but who listens to me?

Posted By: Jason
I have a Comiskey Brown's champs that is trimmed, has red ink on the letters, and back is skinned.  Trimmed bottom and top but presentable image.  $200 dlvd.

Jason
